summary: This memorandum requests the services of a Collins Modem Field Service Engineer to assist with the installation and testing of two Collins Radio Company Model TE-216D-160 High Frequency Data Modems. The Office of Communications intends to test the feasibility of transmitting Secure (encrypted) Voice over a narrow band, high frequency, radio circuit and determine their suitability for high speed data transmission.
title: Request for Services of Collins Modem Field Service Engineer
sender: John W. Coffey, Director of Communications
